Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~angelo.decaro Could you help correct this throughout the doc?

Action.author: angelo.decaro
Action.body: ~denyeart , I removed all the reference to "orderer" as an identity type in the documentation. Let me note anyway that Fabric-CA is designed to be agnostic to the meaning of the types. As long as there is a registrar that can handle type X then one can request an identity of type X. That does not mean that Fabric will be able to handle identity of type X, of course.Â

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Merged in master and cherry picked to release-1.4: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/fabric-ca/+/31734/
